1.content: Investigate and fix suits variants data integrity issue
1.details: Apply the same color-matching variant fix we used for blazers to all suit products, ensuring each suit product only shows variants that match its primary color

2.content: Investigate and fix vests variants data integrity issue
2.details: Apply the same color-matching variant fix we used for blazers to all vest products, ensuring each vest product only shows variants that match its primary color

3.content: Diagnose and fix 401 authentication error in product management
3.details: Investigate the 401 error occurring when users try to update and save products manually. Check API endpoints, authentication tokens, and Supabase RLS policies

4.content: Test and verify all fixes are working properly
4.details: Confirm that suits and vests show correct variants, and that manual product updates work without authentication errors
